study.study_title: Tipton et al., Diversity, cellular origin and autoreactivity of antibody-secreting cell population expansions in acute systemic lupus erythematosus
study.lab_name: Sanz Lab, Department of Medicine, Division of Rheumatology, Emory University
study.inclusion_exclusion_criteria: 8 healthy subjects, 4 with trivalent influenza vaccination and 4 with tetanus vaccination, 8 SLE patients experiecing acute flares.
study.submitted_by: C.M. Tipton, C.F. Fucile, I. Sanz

sample.cell_isolation: PBMCs isolated using ficoll density gradient centrifugation
sample.cell_processing_protocol: PBMCs isolated using ficoll density gradient centrifugation, Cells stained with anti-human antibodies for multi-color flow cytometry and cell sorting, RNA isolated from total cells using RNeasy Micro kit, 2ng of RNA for Reverse Transcription
sample.sequencing_kit: Illumina 250bp x2 v2/300bp x2 v3 kit

data_processing.software_versions: SRA Toolkit 2.8.2-1, cutadapt 1.14, fastqc 0.11.5, pear 0.9.10, biopython 2.7.13, IMGT/V-QUEST 3.4.17
data_processing.data_processing_protocols: Primers removed and imgt annotation of quality filtered sequences
